snippet: In December, Derek Stevens placed a $20,000 bet on Michigan State winning the N.C.A.A. title at his friend’s casino, and two more Spartan wins would give him a $1 million payoff.
abstract: Casino owner Derek Stevens stands to win $1 million if Michigan State wins NCAA men's basketball tournament; on Dec 5 Stevens placed $20,000 bet at Golden Nugget casino in Las Vegas, which is owned by his friend Tilman J Fertitta, on Michigan State--then with record of 5-3--to win it all, at odds of 50-1.
lead_paragraph: In December, Derek Stevens placed a $20,000 bet on Michigan State winning the N.C.A.A. title at his friend’s casino, and two more Spartan wins would give him a $1 million payoff.

headline.main: With 50-1 Bet, Casino Owner Sits Two Michigan State Wins From $1 Million
headline.print_headline: Casino Owner Is a Lock to Win This Huge Bet. Only Question: Which Casino Owner?
